name: Topper Carrier (itch)
description:
There are several challenges, for about 18 different scenarios. Each with their own difficulty. There are 10 drivers and 10 cars of different colors. Cross the finish line, show that you are the best.

The game was immaturely published on Steam and deleted, but now is better and available on Game Jolt and Itch.io. There's still a lot to improve, and so we will!

Link to Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/toppercarrierracing/645272
